string.text: Allegiance Overhaul failed to load! See details in the mod log.
Error initialising Allegiance Overhaul! See details in the mod log. Error text: "{EXCEPTION_MESSAGE}"
Allegiance Overhaul identified possible conflicts with other mods! See details in the mod log.
Specify if below rules should affect all kingdoms, or just the player's one. Default is [All kingdoms].
Specify if you interested in debugging all kingdoms, or just the player's one. Default is [Player's kingdom].
Enables accounting for additional factors when faction evaluating kingdom value. Affects both leave or defection probability and actual bartering (may make it more pricey).
The amount of denars that is interconvertible to one influence point. Native is 500. Default = 1000.
Vassal minor factions follow general rules

Specify if vassal minor factions should use general logic when considering leaving their kingdoms. If disabled, minor factions will use mercenary logic even being vassals. Enabling is suggested, consider this a bug fix.
Enable adding additional info to hero tooltips in game Encyclopedia. Adds info about relations, loyalty etc - depending on enabled systems.
Specify if you interested in debugging all of the mod functionality, or just some particular systems. Default is [All systems].
Enables general debug messages. These are informative and reasonably lore-friendly, but spammy. Default is false.
Enables technical debug messages. These are not localized, poorly readable and extremely spammy. Default is false.
Specify if there should be a checkup for possible conflicts with other mods, that are using Harmony patches on same methods as Allegiance Overhaul.
List of IDs of the mods that should be ignored when checking for possible conflicts. Those IDs should be separated by semicolon.
These settings are intended for mod testing purposes, do not use them in actual gameplay.
Override kingdom decisions for free. Cheat!

If "Determined kingdom pick logic" option from "Migration tweaks" system is enabled, player kingdom will always be chosen as a kingdom to join or defect to. Enabling this option also forces any checks on scores to join to be skipped. Cheat!
Destabilize the evaluation of the ScoreOfClanToJoinKingdom.
Negative score modifier makes harder for clans to defect, positive score modifier increases probability of defection. Measured in millions. Default = 10.0.
Destabilize the evaluation of the ScoreOfClanToLeaveKingdom.
Negative score modifier makes harder for clans to leave, positive score modifier increases probability of clans leaving kingdoms. Measured in millions. Default = 10.0.
